labels.analysis: The Bluesky MCP Server enables interaction with the Bluesky social network and the ATProtocol through natural language commands. It provides tools for fetching user profiles, posts, and feeds; performing searches; liking, posting, and following users; and analyzing engagement metrics (e.g., likes, trends). Core functionality revolves around social media integration, content retrieval, and user action automation within the Bluesky ecosystem.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Social Media" was chosen because the server's tools are centered around interacting with Bluesky's social network. Secondary labels "Communication Tools" and "API Integration" reflect its messaging capabilities and direct API-based interaction with Bluesky. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories cover the server's functionality adequately.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Bluesky MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @brianellin/bsky-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Connect to Bluesky and interact with the ATProtocol using natural language. Fetch, analyze, and post content seamlessly within your LLM applications. Enhance your experience by leveraging Bluesky's features directly in your context window.

tools.name: get-timeline-posts
tools.description: Deploy Server Bluesky MCP Server @brianellin/bsky-mcp-server Try in Playground get-timeline-posts

tools.name: create-post
tools.description: Create a new post on Bluesky

tools.name: get-profile
tools.description: Get a user's profile from Bluesky

tools.name: search-feeds
tools.description: Search for custom feeds on Bluesky

tools.name: get-liked-posts
tools.description: Get a list of posts that the authenticated user has liked

tools.name: get-trends
tools.description: Get current trending topics on Bluesky

tools.name: get-pinned-feeds
tools.description: Get the authenticated user's pinned feeds and lists.

tools.name: get-feed-posts
tools.description: Fetch posts from a specified feed

tools.name: get-list-posts
tools.description: Fetch posts from users in a specified list

tools.name: get-user-posts
tools.description: Fetch posts from a specific user

tools.name: get-follows
tools.description: Get a list of users that a person follows

tools.name: get-post-likes
tools.description: Get information about users who have liked a specific post

tools.name: list-resources
tools.description: List all available MCP resources with their descriptions

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@brianellin/bsky-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
